t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    n=int(raw_input())
    x=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    y=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    x.sort()
    y.sort()
    c=0
    k=0
    for j in xrange(n):
        c+=1
        if y[k]<=x[j]:
            c-=1
            k+=1
    if c>=0:
        print c
    else:
        print -1
